title: cryptech
author: cryptech
content: Promote Your Crypto/NFT/Web3 Project on Social media & the Biggest Names in Web3 (Cointelegraph, Bitcoin.com, Beincrypto, CryptoPotato, etc.)Give instant credibility to your Crypto/NFT/Token/Defi by partnering with the most well-known, authoritative & content-rich Crypto-only websites on the planetThen reach out to these crypto-savvy investors on Facebook, Instagram, Reddit & Twitter (social media networks with the most crypto-related activity)Social Media included: 1. Facebook2. Instagram3. Twitter4. RedditWebsites Included:- Cointelegraph (9.3 Million Impressions Per Month)- Bitcoin.com (3.8 Million Impressions Per Month)- NewsBTC (750K Impressions Per Month)- Bitcoinist (1.5 Million Impressions Per Month)- Bravenewcoin (78.3K Impressions Per Month)- TheCryptoBasic (885K Million Impressions Per Month)- CryptoNewsz (500K Impressions Per Month)- CryptoPotato (1.6 Million Impressions Per Month)- DailyCoin (184K Impressions Per Month)- CryptoNinjas (36K Impressions Per Month)- NullTx (68K Impressions Per Month)- Coinquora (305K Impressions Per Month)- Coinspeaker (117K Impressions Per Month)- CryptoReporter (12K Impressions Per Month)- BeinCrypto (3.1 Million Impressions Per Month)==================================Expose your project to an established audience of hardcore crypto investors - 100% hands-free. Our service includes:1. Setup & Management2. Campaign planning & research3. Content & Creative (Banners, images, videos GIFs, etc)4. Being your Point of Contact with the website5. Accounts, profiles & payment methods6. Reports & StatisticsBoost investor relations. Raise funds. Control your story. Beat the competition. Display your expertise. GROW FASTERIf you’re someone with a great crypto project, but struggling with marketing, this is a great opportunity to get the word out & gain massive traction extremely fast.With a 9+ year marketing background & an equal amount of years in the cryptosphere, promoting numerous crypto projects, we breathe, eat & understand crypto unlike your traditional marketing Agency.Thanks-Prakhar (support@0penny.com)=================== Learn More ===================Get a Cost Estimate - https://my.0penny.com/costimationFrequently Asked Questions - https://my.0penny.com/faqCase Studies - https://casestudies.0penny.com/ =================== Contact Us =====================Skype - https://my.0penny.com/skypeTelegram - https://my.0penny.com/telegramWhatsapp - https://my.0penny.com/whatsapp===================================================Code:https://linktr.ee/0penny
